title: Full Recovery! Full Throttle!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Tada~, Ai has fully recovered!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Congrats. You truly hung in there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Really though, it was so terrible! Ai couldn’t move my body, so Ai had a full tank of gas and couldn’t sleep at night because Ai wouldn’t get tired~. My condition is gonna get worse if I stay idle.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hey, you’re not just going to suddenly go full throttle on practice, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oooh, was that a pun?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It wasn’t. You’re probably out of shape by now, so start slow, alright?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Mmgh, okay....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>....Fufu<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hm? What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You may act like a big sister in front of everyone, Ai. But it’s really cute how sometimes your childish side comes through.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eeeh!? No, Ai is not like that! Come on, Karin, don’t laugh~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
